title: WMS group ('GetCapabilities')
description: A number of layers from a Web Mapping Service server

itemProperties.title: Item Properties
itemProperties.description: Additional properties applied to each item in the group, overriding values retrieved from data sources.

titleField.title: Title field
titleField.description: The field name to use as the primary title in the catalog view. Default 'title', but 'name' or 'abstract' are possible.

flatten.title: Flatten hierarchy
flatten.description: Whether the list of layers queried from GetCapabilities should be flattened into a list with no hierarchy.
